branchDelta.reason: No base ref available (set WORKFLOW_BASE_REF or ensure origin base branch is fetched).

checks.name: Implementation edits require active change or archive artifacts
checks.details: implementation_files=26; active_changes=0; has_archive_artifacts=True; files=.trellis/spec/guides/memory-governance.md, .trellis/spec/guides/openspec-workflow.md, .trellis/spec/guides/quality-gates.md, .trellis/workspace/codex/index.md, .trellis/workspace/codex/journal-2.md, .trellis/workspace/index.md, AGENTS.md, CLAUDE.md (+18 more)
checks.remediation: Create an OpenSpec change (openspec new change <name>) and complete artifacts before implementation, or archive completed change properly.

checks.name: Canonical specs updated only via archive flow
checks.remediation: Avoid direct canonical spec edits during active implementation; use change deltas and openspec archive to merge.

checks.name: Implementation delta excludes denylisted sensitive paths
checks.remediation: Remove edits to denylisted sensitive files or update policy with explicit reviewed exception.

checks.name: Durable artifact secret-pattern scan passes
checks.remediation: Redact credential-like material from durable artifacts and rerun verify.

checks.name: Dispatcher '.claude/agents/dispatch.md' keeps thin orchestrator tool boundary
checks.details: available=True; tools=Read, Bash, mcp__exa__web_search_exa, mcp__exa__get_code_context_exa; forbidden_found=none; reason=
checks.remediation: Keep dispatch agent read/route-only; remove forbidden write-capable tools from frontmatter.

checks.name: Implementation branch matches owner/change pattern
checks.remediation: Use branch format from workflow policy config (for example: sbk-codex-<change>).

checks.name: Implementation scope maps to exactly one active change
checks.remediation: Keep one active OpenSpec change per implementation branch.

checks.name: Branch change id matches active change
checks.remediation: Rename branch or active change so branch <change> segment matches active OpenSpec change id.

checks.name: Local implementation runs from linked worktree
checks.remediation: Run implementation in linked worktree (git worktree add) using one branch per change.

checks.name: Local implementation includes owner-scoped session evidence
checks.remediation: Update session evidence under .trellis/workspace/codex/ before verify.

checks.name: Owner session evidence includes disclosure metadata
checks.details: required_markers=Memory Sources, Disclosure Level, Source IDs; files_checked=1; violations=none
checks.remediation: Add disclosure metadata markers to owner session evidence: Memory Sources, Disclosure Level, Source IDs.
